duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in the preparation of the annual operating plan, long-term strategic plan, quarterly forecasts, and quarter-end financial reporting for revenue, gross margin, OPEX, operating margins, and balance sheet.
Provide analysis to identify risks and opportunities to operations and the business unit to assist with the forecasting and reporting processes.
Partner with respective Business Operations and manage the project plans for product growth and development to align with strategies to forecasts and influence outcomes.
Complete detailed analysis and commentary for finance and non-finance executives to drive gross margin and profitability improvement.
Develop complex modeling in support of strategic plans, business sizing, and performance management.
Collaborate with Business Unit to identify and drive profitability.
Support team input to inventory & variance team for standard revaluation cost impacts & Inventory outflow model inputs.
Provide leadership and guidance to revenue, costing, and I&W analysts that assist with the forecasting and reporting processes.
Partner with business management, marketing, engineering, and other functions to align analyses and forecasts and influence outcomes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree required, Master’s or MBA is a plus.
